alert.note: Alert for Mayes; Rogers; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 2:21AM CDT until May 15 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southwestern Mayes County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northern Wagoner County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 219 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Inola, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Coweta... Chouteau... Inola... Locust Grove... Sportsmen Acres Community... Mazie... Murphy... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
